Welcome to the world of Hidden Flame

Check out the latest news on how the progress is going with the creation and development of the game.
character
Kioshi Yamamoto and Sakura Yamamoto are the main characters of the game. You will have the opportunity to choose which character to play as and progress through the storyline.
story
The game's plot will take place on an island with three palaces, each with its own settlement. You need to help the main character regain their honor.
mechanics
Explore the open world, battle enemies, and discover rare items scattered throughout the map. Enjoy the game process!
